    • Constructor Detail

      • HDBManager

        public HDBManager​(String name,
                  String userId,
                  String password,
                  int age,
                  MaritalStatus maritalStatus,
                  UserType userType)
        Constructor to initialise the HDBManager object with common attributes.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the HDBManager.
        userId - The unique identifier for the HDBManager.
        password - The password for the HDBManager.
        age - The age of the HDBManager.
        maritalStatus - The marital status of the HDBManager (e.g., "Single", "Married").
        userType - The type of user (e.g., UserType.HDB_MANAGER).
        See Also:
        UserType

    • Method Detail

      • createProject

        public int createProject​(BTOProject project)
                  throws IllegalStateException
        Create a BTO project listing. Project information is provided from ProjectController.createProject()
        Parameters:
        project - The BTOProject object containing the project information.
        Returns:
        The ID of the created project.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the project cannot be created due to an error (e.g. Overlapping application periods).

      • editProject

        public int editProject​(BTOProject project)
                throws IllegalAccessException,
                       IllegalStateException
        Edits an existing BTO project listing. Project information is provided from ProjectController.editProject()
        Parameters:
        project - The BTOProject object containing the updated project information.
        Returns:
        The ID of the updated project.
        Throws:
        IllegalAccessException - if the project cannot be edited due to an error (e.g. Project not found, not managed by this manager).
        IllegalStateException - if the project cannot be edited due to an error (e.g. Overlapping application periods).

      • deleteProject

        public boolean deleteProject​(BTOProject project)
                      throws IllegalAccessException
        Delete a BTO project listing. Project information is provided from ProjectController.deleteProject()
        Parameters:
        project - The BTOProject object to be deleted.
        Returns:
        true if the project was successfully deleted, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IllegalAccessException - if the project cannot be deleted due to an error (e.g. Project not found, not managed by this manager).

      • toggleProjectVisibility

        public boolean toggleProjectVisibility​(BTOProject project)
                                throws IllegalAccessException
        Toggle project visibility between visible and hidden by toggling the BTOProject.getVisibility().
        Parameters:
        project - The BTOProject object to be toggled.
        Returns:
        The updated visibility status of the project.
        Throws:
        IllegalAccessException - if the project cannot be toggled due to an error.

      • getAllProjects

        public List<BTOProject> getAllProjects()
        Get all projects managed by all managers, regardless of visibility status.
        Returns:
        A list of BTOProject objects managed by all managers.

      • getManagedProjects

        public ArrayList<BTOProject> getManagedProjects()
        Get all projects managed by the HDBManager, regardless of visibility status.
        Returns:
        A list of BTOProject objects managed by the HDBManager.

      • getPendingAndSuccessfulRegistrations

        public ArrayList<OfficerRegistration> getPendingAndSuccessfulRegistrations()
        Get all pending and successful registrations for all projects, even if the projects are not managed by this manager.
        Returns:
        A list of OfficerRegistration objects with pending or successful status.

      • approveRegistration

        public void approveRegistration​(OfficerRegistration registration)
                         throws IllegalStateException,
                                IllegalAccessException
        Approve a HDB Officer's registration for a project
        Parameters:
        registration - The OfficerRegistration object to be approved.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the registration is not pending, or if the project does not have available slots for officers.
        IllegalAccessException - if the registration cannot be approved due to not being able to find the project in the database.

      • rejectRegistration

        public void rejectRegistration​(OfficerRegistration registration)
        Reject a HDB Officer's registration for a project
        Parameters:
        registration - The OfficerRegistration object to be rejected.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the registration is not pending.

      • approveApplication

        public void approveApplication​(BTOApplication application)
                        throws IllegalStateException
        Approve a BTOApplication for a project managed by this manager.
        Parameters:
        application - The BTOApplication object to be approved.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the application is not pending or if the project is not managed by this manager.

      • rejectApplication

        public void rejectApplication​(BTOApplication application)
                       throws IllegalStateException
        Reject a BTOApplication for a project managed by this manager.
        Parameters:
        application - The BTOApplication object to be rejected.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the application is not pending or if the project is not managed by this manager.

      • generateReport

        public void generateReport()
        Generate a report of the list of applicants with their respective flat booking - flat type, project name, age, marital status.

      • generateReport

        public void generateReport​(Integer minAge,
                           Integer maxAge,
                           MaritalStatus maritalStatus,
                           String projectName,
                           FlatType flatType)
        Generate a report of the list of applicants with their respective flat booking - flat type, project name, age, marital status. Supports filtering based on various categories such as min_age, max_age, marital status, and project name. If any of the parameters are null, assume that the user wants to include all applicants in that category.
        Parameters:
        minAge - The minimum age of the applicants to be included in the report.
        maxAge - The maximum age of the applicants to be included in the report.
        maritalStatus - The marital status of the applicants to be included in the report.
        projectName - The name of the project to be included in the report.
        flatType - The type of flat to be included in the report.

      • viewEnquiries

        public List<Enquiry> viewEnquiries()
        View enquiries of all projects, even if the projects are not managed by this manager.
        Returns:
        A list of Enquiry objects for all projects.

      • replyToEnquiry

        public void replyToEnquiry​(Enquiry enquiry,
                           String reply)
                    throws IllegalStateException
        Reply to an enquiry from an applicant for a project managed by this manager.
        Parameters:
        enquiry - The Enquiry object to reply to.
        reply - The reply message.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the enquiry is not managed by this manager.
        See Also:
        Enquiry.addReplyMessage(User, String)
